contentrichtext.text: {{taxobox |name = ''Neobathiea'' |regnum = [[Plantae]] |unranked_divisio = [[Angiosperms]] |unranked_classis = [[Monocots]] |ordo = [[Asparagales]] |familia = [[Orchidaceae]] |subfamilia = [[Epidendroideae]] |tribus = [[Vandeae]] |subtribus = [[Angraecinae]] |alliance = Angraecum |genus = '''''Neobathiea''''' |genus_authority = [[Rudolf Schlechter|Schltr.]] 1925 |subdivision_ranks = [[species]] |subdivision = ''[[Neobathiea grandidierana]]''<br> ''[[Neobathiea hirtula]]''<br> ''[[Neobathiea keraudrenae]]''<br> ''[[Neobathiea perrieri]]''<br> ''[[Neobathiea spatulata]]'' |synonyms = ''Bathiea'' <small>Schltr.</small> |}} '''''Neobathiea''''', abbreviated as '''Nbth''' in the horticultural trade,<ref>http://www.rhs.org.uk/RHSWebsite/files/87/87be8b1e-908e-4e04-9ee6-30c438354458.pdf</ref> is a [[monophyletic]] [[genus]] of rare [[orchids]] (family ([[Orchidaceae]]), native to [[tropical moist broadleaf forests]] of [[Madagascar]] and the [[Comoro Islands]]. The genus is named for the French [[botany|botanist]] [[Henri Perrier de la Bâthie]]. The [[species]] include small, monopodial [[epiphyte]]s, with relatively large white, green, or green-and-white flowers with a long spur at the base of the lip. The long-spurred ''[[Neobathiea grandidierana]]'' from Madagascar is pollinated by a long-tongued sphinginid hawkmoth ''[[Panogena lingens]]'' with the [[pollinaria]] deposited on the basal part of the [[proboscis]] of the moth.<ref name="Neobathiea grandidierana">{{cite journal | author=L. Aners Nilsson, Lars Johnsson, Lydia Ralison, Emile Randrianjohany| title=Angraecoid Orchids and Hawkmoths in Central Madagascar: Specialized Pollination Systems and Generalist Foragers| journal=Biotropica| year=dec. 1987| volume=19| issue=4| pages=310–318| doi=10.2307/2388628 | jstor=2388628 | publisher=The Association for Tropical Biology and Conservation}}</ref> == Synonyms == *''Neobathiea filicornu'' <small>Schltr</small> is a synonym of ''[[Neobathiea grandidierana]]'' (<small>Rchb.f.) Garay</small> *''Neobathiea gracilis'' <small>Schltr</small> and ''Neobathiea sambiranoensis'' <small>Schltr</small> are synonyms of ''[[Aeranthes schlechteri]]'' <small>Bosser</small>. == Notes == {{reflist}} [[Category:Orchid genera]] [[Category:Angraecinae]] [[Category:Epiphytes]] {{Vandeae-stub}}
